long_description: The Topeak PanoBike Heart Rate Monitor transmits heart-rate data in real time to your iPhone 4S or 5 for analysis and sharing. All you need is the Topeak PanoBike app on your smartphone, which uses the iPhone's built-in GPS and accelerometers to trace the route and measure speed, gradient and altitude. The Topeak PanoBike Heart Rate Monitor syncs up with app to display a precise measurement of your heart rate in real time. Compact, low profile heart rate monitor with soft fabric chest strap molds to your body shape and allows comfortable, full range of motion. Bluetooth Smart algorithm extends battery time up to 1800 hrs. (5 years if you work out for 1 hr. per day) on the single included CR2032 battery. Works with iPhone 4S/5 and iPod Touch with BLE 4.0. Optional accessories include the Topeak PanoBike Speed and Cadence Sensor and the Topeak PanoBike Mobile Power Pack, sold separately.
